archimate:Requirement.name: Each data entity must have a lifecyce defined in meta data which includes details any legal or regualtory requiremnt that apply to the data entity
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Data entity must record linkage to all legal and/or regulatory policies and/or standards that apply to the data entity.
Through the capture all of the information the business needs, fully exploit the TOTEX opportunity through whole life cost decision making.
